entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cambridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 09:31 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: SW 30 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
